description.default: Open Chinese Convert (OpenCC) is an opensource project for conversions between Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and Japanese Kanji (Shinjitai). It supports character-level and phrase-level conversion, character variant conversion and regional idioms among Mainland China, Taiwan and Hong Kong. This is not translation tool between Mandarin and Cantonese, etc.
description.zh_CN: 开放中文转换 (Open Chinese Convert, OpenCC)是一个中文简繁转换开源项目，支持词汇级别的转换、异体字转换和地区习惯用词转换（中国大陆、台湾、香港、日本新字体）。不提供普通话与粤语的转换。

description.default: Import md, epub, docx, html, etc. into Siyuan notes. Currently supported formats: .md, .epub, .docx, .html, .opml.
description.zh_CN: 将 md, epub, docx, html 等格式的文件导入到思源笔记。目前支持的格式：.md, .epub, .docx, .html, .opml。
给思源增加一个跟番茄没有一点关系的番茄钟
description.en_US: Add a Pomodoro to SiYuan that has nothing to do with tomatoes

description.default: 标注后自动跳转到文档的位置
description.zh_CN: 标注后自动跳转到文档的位置
保护眼睛, 从思源做起
description.en_US: You need to protect your eyesight

description.default: Let little lovely girl accompany you to write notes
description.zh_CN: 让小可爱陪你写笔记吧~

description.default: 表情包- Twitter Emoji
表情包 -Google Noto Color Emoji
Let your cat write math formulas happily.
description.zh_CN: 让你家的猫猫能快乐地写数学公式

description.default: 随机题头图
description.zh_CN: 随机题头图

description.default: Open Markdown in SiYuan, tested in Windows 11
description.zh_CN: Open Markdown in SiYua, tested in Windows 11n

description.default: This is a plugin add quick swtichs for snippets
description.zh_CN: 这就一个用于快速开关代码片段的插件，如果你不怎么用代码片段可能你就不需要它

description.default: This is a plugin to use siyuan like a browser
description.zh_CN: 把思源当成一个简单的浏览器使用

description.default: Open the plugin's API to the global variable globalThis.openAPI to help developers test APIs.
description.zh_CN: 将插件的 API 公开至全局变量 globalThis.openAPI 以帮助开发者测试 APIs。
